property.name: sql
property.value: select l.login_ip as ip, l.login_status as status, l.login_time as login_time, l.logout_time as login_out_time, l.username as username, l.remarks as remarks from login_log l,operator o WHERE l.username=o.username /~username: and o.username = '[username]'~/ order by l.login_time desc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT sum(CASE WHEN d.STATUS='ALLOT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as ALLOT, sum(CASE WHEN d.STATUS='BINDED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as BINDED, sum(CASE WHEN d.STATUS='MAKING' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as MAKING, sum(CASE WHEN d.STATUS='ORDER_WAIT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as ORDER_WAIT, sum(CASE WHEN d.STATUS='ORDER_CONFIRM' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as ORDER_CONFIRM, sum(CASE WHEN d.STATUS='ORDER_FAIL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as ORDER_FAIL, sum(CASE WHEN d.STATUS='OK' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as OK FROM Device d where 1= 1 /~agent_no: and d.agent_no = '[agent_no]'~/ /~customer_pay_no: and d.customer_pay_no = '[customer_pay_no]'~/ /~status: and d.status = '[status]'~/ /~batch_number: and d.batch_number = '[batch_number]'~/ /~customer_no: and d.customer_no = '[customer_no]'~/ /~purchase_serial_number: and d.purchase_serial_number = '[purchase_serial_number]'~/ /~out_warehouse_time_start: and d.out_warehouse_time >= str_to_date('[out_warehouse_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~out_warehouse_time_end: and d.out_warehouse_time <= str_to_date('[out_warehouse_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~activate_time_start: and d.activate_time >= str_to_date('[activate_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~activate_time_end: and d.activate_time <= str_to_date('[activate_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~create_time_start: and d.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and d.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~update_time_start: and d.update_time >= str_to_date('[update_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~update_time_end: and d.update_time <= str_to_date('[update_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~activate_time_start: and d.activate_time >= str_to_date('[activate_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~activate_time_end: and d.activate_time <= str_to_date('[activate_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ ORDER BY d.create_time desc;

property.name: sql
property.value: select o.id as id, o.EXTERNAL_ID as external_id , o.TRANS_TYPE as trans_type , o.CUSTOMER_NO as customer_no , o.POS_CATI as pos_cati , o.PAN as pan , o.AMOUNT as amount , o.CARD_TYPE as card_type , o.ISSUER as issuer , o.STATUS as status , o.CREDIT_STATUS as credit_status , o.POS_BATCH as pos_batch , o.POS_REQUEST_ID as pos_request_id , o.AUTHORIZATION_CODE as authorization_code , o.CUSTOMER_ORDER_CODE as customer_order_code , o.CURRENCY_TYPE as currency_type , o.CREATE_TIME as create_time , o.COMPLETE_TIME as complete_time , o.SETTLE_TIME as settle_time , o.CREDIT_TIME as credit_time , o.DESCRIPTION as description , o.OPTIMISTIC as optimistic , o.year_commission as year_commission, o.quarter_commission as quarter_commission, o.month_commission as month_commission , c.SHORT_NAME as customer_name , p.customer_fee as customer_fee , rtcb.status as check_bill_record_status , rtcb.AUDIT_REMARK as audit_remark, rtcb.AGENT_REMARK as agent_remark from pos_order o left join pos_payment p on o.id=p.order_id and P.STATUS='SUCCESS' AND P.TRANS_TYPE in ('PURCHASE','PRE_AUTH_COMP','SPECIFY_QUANCUN','NOT_SPECIFY_QUANCUN','CASH_RECHARGE_QUNCUN','OFFLINE_PURCHASE') left join REAL_TIME_CHECK_BILL rtcb on (rtcb.BUSINESS_TYPE = 'POS_ORDER' and rtcb.BUSINESS_ID = o.EXTERNAL_ID) left join customer c on o.CUSTOMER_NO = c.CUSTOMER_NO where 1=1 /~id: and o.id = [id]~/ /~externalId: and o.EXTERNAL_ID = [externalId]~/ /~transType: and o.TRANS_TYPE ='[transType]' ~/ /~customerNo: and o.customer_no ='[customerNo]' ~/ /~posCati: and o.pos_cati ='[posCati]' ~/ /~pan: and o.pan ='[pan]' ~/ /~panEnd: and o.pan like '%[panEnd]' ~/ /~amountStart: and o.amount >= [amountStart] ~/ /~amountEnd: and o.amount <= [amountEnd] ~/ /~cardType: and o.CARD_TYPE ='[cardType]' ~/ /~issuer: and o.ISSUER ='[issuer]' ~/ /~status: and o.STATUS in ('[status]') ~/ /~creditStatus: and o.CREDIT_STATUS ='[creditStatus]' ~/ /~authorizationCode: and o.authorization_code ='[authorizationCode]' ~/ /~createTimeStart: and o.create_time >= to_date('[createTimeStart] 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~createTimeEnd: and o.create_time <= to_date('[createTimeEnd] 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')~/ /~agentNo: and o.agent_no = '[agentNo]' ~/ /~mcc: and c.mcc = '[mcc]' ~/ /~check_bill_record_status: and rtcb.status [check_bill_record_status] ~/ order by o.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select o.id as id, o.EXTERNAL_ID as external_id , o.TRANS_TYPE as trans_type , o.CUSTOMER_NO as customer_no , o.POS_CATI as pos_cati , o.PAN as pan , o.AMOUNT as amount , o.CARD_TYPE as card_type , o.ISSUER as issuer , o.STATUS as status , o.CREDIT_STATUS as credit_status , o.POS_BATCH as pos_batch , o.POS_REQUEST_ID as pos_request_id , o.AUTHORIZATION_CODE as authorization_code , o.CUSTOMER_ORDER_CODE as customer_order_code , o.CURRENCY_TYPE as currency_type , o.CREATE_TIME as create_time , o.COMPLETE_TIME as complete_time , o.SETTLE_TIME as settle_time , o.CREDIT_TIME as credit_time , o.DESCRIPTION as description , o.OPTIMISTIC as optimistic , o.year_commission as year_commission, o.quarter_commission as quarter_commission, o.month_commission as month_commission , c.SHORT_NAME as customer_name , p.customer_fee as customer_fee from pos_order o left join pos_payment p on o.id=p.order_id and P.STATUS='SUCCESS' AND P.TRANS_TYPE in ('PURCHASE','PRE_AUTH_COMP','PRE_AUTH','SPECIFY_QUANCUN','NOT_SPECIFY_QUANCUN','CASH_RECHARGE_QUNCUN','OFFLINE_PURCHASE'), customer c where o.CUSTOMER_NO = c.CUSTOMER_NO /~id: and o.id = [id]~/ /~externalId: and o.EXTERNAL_ID = [externalId]~/ /~transType: and o.TRANS_TYPE ='[transType]' ~/ /~customerNo: and o.customer_no ='[customerNo]' ~/ /~posCati: and o.pos_cati ='[posCati]' ~/ /~pan: and o.pan ='[pan]' ~/ /~panEnd: and o.pan like '%[panEnd]' ~/ /~amountStart: and o.amount >= [amountStart] ~/ /~amountEnd: and o.amount <= [amountEnd] ~/ /~cardType: and o.CARD_TYPE ='[cardType]' ~/ /~issuer: and o.ISSUER ='[issuer]' ~/ /~status: and o.STATUS in ('[status]') ~/ /~creditStatus: and o.CREDIT_STATUS ='[creditStatus]' ~/ /~authorizationCode: and o.authorization_code ='[authorizationCode]' ~/ /~createTimeStart: and o.create_time >= to_date('[createTimeStart] 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~createTimeEnd: and o.create_time <= to_date('[createTimeEnd] 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')~/ /~agentNo: and o.agent_no = '[agentNo]' ~/ /~mcc: and c.mcc = '[mcc]' ~/ order by o.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT count(*) as ordercount, sum(o.amount) as trxamount from pos_order o left join pos_payment p on o.id=p.order_id and P.STATUS='SUCCESS' AND P.TRANS_TYPE in ('PURCHASE','PRE_AUTH_COMP') left join REAL_TIME_CHECK_BILL rtcb on (rtcb.BUSINESS_TYPE = 'POS_ORDER' and rtcb.BUSINESS_ID = o.EXTERNAL_ID) left join customer c on o.CUSTOMER_NO = c.CUSTOMER_NO where 1=1 /~id: and o.id = [id]~/ /~externalId: and o.EXTERNAL_ID = [externalId]~/ /~transType: and o.TRANS_TYPE ='[transType]' ~/ /~customerNo: and o.customer_no ='[customerNo]' ~/ /~posCati: and o.pos_cati ='[posCati]' ~/ /~pan: and o.pan ='[pan]' ~/ /~panEnd: and o.pan like '%[panEnd]' ~/ /~amountStart: and o.amount >= [amountStart] ~/ /~amountEnd: and o.amount <= [amountEnd] ~/ /~cardType: and o.CARD_TYPE ='[cardType]' ~/ /~issuer: and o.ISSUER ='[issuer]' ~/ /~status: and o.STATUS in ('[status]') ~/ /~creditStatus: and o.CREDIT_STATUS ='[creditStatus]' ~/ /~authorizationCode: and o.authorization_code ='[authorizationCode]' ~/ /~createTimeStart: and o.create_time >= to_date('[createTimeStart] 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~createTimeEnd: and o.create_time <= to_date('[createTimeEnd] 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')~/ /~agentNo: and o.agent_no = '[agentNo]' ~/ /~mcc: and c.mcc = '[mcc]' ~/ /~check_bill_record_status: and rtcb.status [check_bill_record_status] ~/ order by o.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select s.SHOP_NAME as shopname, o.POS_CATI as pos_cati, sum(o.AMOUNT) as amount , sum(p.customer_fee) as customer_fee , count(*) as ordercount from pos_order o left join pos_payment p on o.id=p.order_id and P.STATUS='SUCCESS' AND P.TRANS_TYPE in ('PURCHASE','PRE_AUTH_COMP') left join shop s on s.SHOP_NO = o.SHOP_NO where 1=1 and o.status in ('SUCCESS','SETTLED') /~customerNo: and o.customer_no ='[customerNo]' ~/ /~createTimeStart: and o.create_time >= to_date('[createTimeStart] 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~createTimeEnd: and o.create_time <= to_date('[createTimeEnd] 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')~/ group by o.POS_CATI,s.SHOP_NAME

property.name: sql
property.value: select s.SHOP_NAME as shopname, o.POS_CATI as pos_cati, sum(o.AMOUNT) as amount , sum(p.customer_fee) as customer_fee , count(*) as ordercount from pos_order o left join pos_payment p on o.id=p.order_id and P.STATUS='SUCCESS' AND P.TRANS_TYPE in ('PURCHASE','PRE_AUTH_COMP') left join shop s on s.SHOP_NO = o.SHOP_NO where 1=1 and o.status in ('SUCCESS','SETTLED') /~customerNo: and o.customer_no ='[customerNo]' ~/ /~createTimeStart: and o.create_time >= to_date('[createTimeStart] 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~createTimeEnd: and o.create_time <= to_date('[createTimeEnd] 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')~/ group by o.POS_CATI,s.SHOP_NAME

property.name: sql
property.value: select sum(o.AMOUNT) as amount , sum(p.customer_fee) as customer_fee , count(*) as ordercount from pos_order o left join pos_payment p on o.id=p.order_id and P.STATUS='SUCCESS' AND P.TRANS_TYPE in ('PURCHASE','PRE_AUTH_COMP') left join shop s on s.SHOP_NO = o.SHOP_NO where 1=1 and o.status in ('SUCCESS','SETTLED') /~customerNo: and o.customer_no ='[customerNo]' ~/ /~createTimeStart: and o.create_time >= to_date('[createTimeStart] 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~createTimeEnd: and o.create_time <= to_date('[createTimeEnd] 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')~/

property.name: sql
property.value: select l.id as id, l.OPTIMISTIC as optimistic, l.USERNAME as username, l.REMARKS as remarks, l.SESSION_ID as session_id, l.LOGOUT_TIME as logout_time, l.LOGIN_TIME as login_time, l.LOGIN_IP as login_ip, l.LOGIN_STATUS as login_status from login_log l where 1=1 /~id: and id = [id]~/ /~optimistic: and l.optimistic ='[optimistic]' ~/ /~userName: and l.username ='[userName]' ~/ /~remarks: and l.remarks ='[remarks]' ~/ /~sessionId: and l.session_id ='[sessionId]' ~/ /~logoutTimeStart: and l.logout_time >= to_date('[logoutTimeStart] 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~logoutTimeEnd: and l.logout_time <= to_date('[logoutTimeEnd] 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~loginTimeStart: and l.login_time >= to_date('[loginTimeStart] 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~loginTimeEnd: and l.login_time <= to_date('[loginTimeEnd] 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~loginIp: and l.login_ip = '[loginIp]'~/ /~loginStatus: and l.login_status = '[loginStatus]'~/ order by l.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select s.id as id, s.AGENT_FEE as agent_fee, s.AGENT_NO as agent_no, s.AGENT_PROFIT as agent_profit, s.AMOUNT as amount, s.CHANNEL_COST as channel_cost, s.CREATE_TIME as create_time, s.CUSTOMER_FEE as customer_fee, s.CUSTOMER_NO as customer_no, s.FEE as fee, s.INTERFACE_CODE as interface_code, s.ORDER_CODE as order_code, s.ORDER_TIME as order_time, s.PLATFROM_PROFIT as platfrom_profit, s.PRODUCT_TYPE as product_type, s.PROFIT_RATIO as profit_ratio, s.PROFIT_TYPE as profit_type, s.SOURCE as source, s.AGENT_LEVEL as agent_level, s.DIRECT_AGENT as direct_agent, s.DIRECT_AGENT_FEE as direct_agent_fee, s.DIRECT_AGENT_PROFIT as direct_agent_profit, s.DIRECT_PROFIT_RATIO as direct_profit_ratio, s.DIRECT_PROFIT_TYPE as direct_profit_type, s.INDIRECT_AGENT as indirect_agent, s.INDIRECT_AGENT_FEE as indirect_agent_fee, s.INDIRECT_AGENT_PROFIT as indirect_agent_profit, s.INDIRECT_PROFIT_RATIO as indirect_profit_ratio, s.INDIRECT_PROFIT_TYPE as indirect_profit_type from share_profit s where 1=1 /~id: and s.id = '[id]'~/ /~create_time_start: and s.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and s.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~order_time_start: and s.order_time >= str_to_date('[order_time_start]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~order_time_end: and s.order_time <= str_to_date('[order_time_end]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~product_type: and s.product_type = '[product_type]' ~/ /~order_code: and s.order_code = '[order_code]' ~/ /~customer_no: and s.customer_no = '[customer_no]' ~/ /~interface_code: and s.interface_code = '[interface_code]' ~/ /~source: and s.source = '[source]' ~/ /~agent_no: and (s.agent_no = '[agent_no]' or s.direct_agent = '[agent_no]' or indirect_agent = '[agent_no]' )~/ /~amount_start: and s.amount >= '[amount_start]' ~/ /~amount_end: and s.amount <= '[amount_end]' ~/ /~fee_start: and s.fee >= '[fee_start]' ~/ /~fee_end: and s.fee <= '[fee_end]' ~/ /~channel_cost_start: and s.channel_cost >= '[channel_cost_start]' ~/ /~channel_cost_end: and s.channel_cost <= '[channel_cost_end]' ~/ /~customer_fee_start: and s.customer_fee >= '[customer_fee_start]' ~/ /~customer_fee_end: and s.customer_fee <= '[customer_fee_end]' ~/ /~agent_fee_start: and s.agent_fee >= '[agent_fee_start]' ~/ /~agent_fee_end: and s.agent_fee <= '[agent_fee_end]' ~/ /~profit_type: and s.profit_type = '[profit_type]' ~/ /~profit_ratio_start: and s.profit_ratio >= '[profit_ratio_start]' ~/ /~profit_ratio_end: and s.profit_ratio <= '[profit_ratio_end]' ~/ /~agent_profit_start: and s.agent_profit >= '[agent_profit_start]' ~/ /~agent_profit_end: and s.agent_profit <= '[agent_profit_end]' ~/ /~platform_profit_start: and s.platfrom_profit >= '[platform_profit_start]' ~/ /~platform_profit_end: and s.platfrom_profit <= '[platform_profit_end]' ~/ order by s.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select s.id as id, s.AGENT_FEE as agent_fee, s.AGENT_NO as agent_no, s.AGENT_PROFIT as agent_profit, s.AMOUNT as amount, s.CHANNEL_COST as channel_cost, s.CREATE_TIME as create_time, s.CUSTOMER_FEE as customer_fee, s.CUSTOMER_NO as customer_no, s.FEE as fee, s.INTERFACE_CODE as interface_code, s.ORDER_CODE as order_code, s.ORDER_TIME as order_time, s.PLATFROM_PROFIT as platfrom_profit, s.PRODUCT_TYPE as product_type, s.PROFIT_RATIO as profit_ratio, s.PROFIT_TYPE as profit_type, s.SOURCE as source, s.AGENT_LEVEL as agent_level, s.DIRECT_AGENT as direct_agent, s.DIRECT_AGENT_FEE as direct_agent_fee, s.DIRECT_AGENT_PROFIT as direct_agent_profit, s.DIRECT_PROFIT_RATIO as direct_profit_ratio, s.DIRECT_PROFIT_TYPE as direct_profit_type, s.INDIRECT_AGENT as indirect_agent, s.INDIRECT_AGENT_FEE as indirect_agent_fee, s.INDIRECT_AGENT_PROFIT as indirect_agent_profit, s.INDIRECT_PROFIT_RATIO as indirect_profit_ratio, s.INDIRECT_PROFIT_TYPE as indirect_profit_type from share_profit s where 1=1 /~id: and s.id = '[id]'~/ /~create_time_start: and s.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and s.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~order_time_start: and s.order_time >= str_to_date('[order_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~order_time_end: and s.order_time <= str_to_date('[order_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~product_type: and s.product_type = '[product_type]' ~/ /~order_code: and s.order_code = '[order_code]' ~/ /~customer_no: and s.customer_no = '[customer_no]' ~/ /~interface_code: and s.interface_code = '[interface_code]' ~/ /~source: and s.source = '[source]' ~/ /~agent_no: and (s.agent_no = '[agent_no]' or s.direct_agent = '[agent_no]' or indirect_agent = '[agent_no]' )~/ /~amount_start: and s.amount >= '[amount_start]' ~/ /~amount_end: and s.amount <= '[amount_end]' ~/ /~fee_start: and s.fee >= '[fee_start]' ~/ /~fee_end: and s.fee <= '[fee_end]' ~/ /~channel_cost_start: and s.channel_cost >= '[channel_cost_start]' ~/ /~channel_cost_end: and s.channel_cost <= '[channel_cost_end]' ~/ /~customer_fee_start: and s.customer_fee >= '[customer_fee_start]' ~/ /~customer_fee_end: and s.customer_fee <= '[customer_fee_end]' ~/ /~agent_fee_start: and s.agent_fee >= '[agent_fee_start]' ~/ /~agent_fee_end: and s.agent_fee <= '[agent_fee_end]' ~/ /~profit_type: and s.profit_type = '[profit_type]' ~/ /~profit_ratio_start: and s.profit_ratio >= '[profit_ratio_start]' ~/ /~profit_ratio_end: and s.profit_ratio <= '[profit_ratio_end]' ~/ /~agent_profit_start: and s.agent_profit >= '[agent_profit_start]' ~/ /~agent_profit_end: and s.agent_profit <= '[agent_profit_end]' ~/ /~platform_profit_start: and s.platfrom_profit >= '[platform_profit_start]' ~/ /~platform_profit_end: and s.platfrom_profit <= '[platform_profit_end]' ~/ order by s.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select o.id as id, o.OPTIMISTIC as optimistic, o.USERNAME as username, o.STATUS as status, o.PASSWORD as password, o.MAX_ERROR_TIMES as max_error_times, o.LAST_LOGIN_ERR_TIME as last_login_err_time, o.MODIFY_PASSWD_CYCLE as modify_passwd_cycle, o.PASSWD_MODIFY_TIME as passwd_modify_time, o.ALLOW_BEGIN_TIME as allow_begin_time, o.ALLOW_END_TIME as allow_end_time, r.NAME as role_name, o.REALNAME as realname, o.CREATE_TIME as create_time, o.CREATE_OPERATOR as create_operator, o.RELOGIN_FLAG as relogin_flag, o.PASSWD_EXPIRE_TIME as passwd_expire_time, o.PASSWD_EFFECT_TIME as passwd_effect_time, o.TRY_TIMES as try_times, o.ORG_CODE as org_code, o.CUSTOMER_NO as customer_no from operator o,roles r where 1=1 and o.ROLE_ID=r.id /~id: and o.id = [id]~/ /~userName: and o.username ='[userName]' ~/ /~realName: and o.realname ='[realName]' ~/ /~createOperator: and o.create_operator ='[createOperator]' ~/ /~role_id: and o.role_id ='[role_id]' ~/ /~orgCode: and o.org_code ='[orgCode]' ~/ /~status: and o.status ='[status]' ~/ /~create_time_start: and o.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and o.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~allowBeginTimeStart: and o.allow_begin_time >= '[allowBeginTimeStart]' ~/ /~allowBeginTimeEnd: and o.allow_begin_time <= '[allowBeginTimeEnd]' ~/ /~passwdEffectTimeStart: and o.passwd_effect_time >= to_date('[passwdEffectTimeStart] 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~passwdEffectTimeEnd: and o.passwd_effect_time <= to_date('[passwdEffectTimeEnd] 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~passwdExpireTimeStart: and o.passwd_expire_time >= to_date('[passwdExpireTimeStart] 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~passwdExpireTimeEnd: and o.passwd_expire_time <= to_date('[passwdExpireTimeEnd] 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~passwdModifyTimeStart: and o.passwd_modify_time >= to_date('[~passwdModifyTimeStart] 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~passwdModifyTimeEnd: and o.passwd_modify_time <= to_date('[passwdModifyTimeEnd] 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ order by o.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select r.ID as id, r.NAME as name, r.ROLE_TYPE as role_type, r.STATUS as status, r.REMARK as remark from roles r where 1 = 1 and r.ROLE_TYPE != 'ADMIN' /~name: and r.NAME like '%[name]%'~/ /~status: and r.STATUS = '[status]'~/ order by r.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select f.ID as id, f.OPTIMISTIC as optimistic, f.NAME as name, f.TYPE as type, f.STATUS as status, f.REMARK as remark, f.ACTION as action, f.IS_CHECK as is_check, f.MENU_ID as menu_id, m.NAME as menu_name from functions f ,menu m where 1=1 and m.id=f.menu_id /~id: and f.id = [id]~/ /~name: and f.name ='[name]' ~/ /~action: and f.action ='[action]' ~/ order by f.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT c.id AS id, c.optimistic AS optimistic, c.ADDR AS addr, c.AGENT_NO AS agent_no, c.CAUTION_MONEY AS caution_money, c.CREATE_TIME AS create_time, c.CUSTOMER_NO AS customer_no, c.CUSTOMER_TYPE AS customer_type, c.FULL_NAME AS full_name, c.LINK_NAME AS link_name, c.PHONE_NO AS phone_no, c.SHORT_NAME AS short_name, c.STATUS AS status, c.PROVINCE AS province, c.CITY AS city, d.CUSTOMER_PAY_NO AS pay_no FROM CUSTOMER c left join device d on d.CUSTOMER_NO = c.customer_no WHERE 1 = 1 /~customer_no: and c.customer_no = '[customer_no]'~/ /~AGENT_NO: and c.agent_no = '[AGENT_NO]'~/ /~customer_type: and c.customer_type = '[customer_type]'~/ /~create_time_start: and c.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~create_time_end: and c.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~shortName: and c.SHORT_NAME like '%[shortName]%'~/ /~status: and c.STATUS = '[status]'~/ order by c.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT c.id AS id, c.optimistic AS optimistic, c.ADDR AS addr, c.AGENT_NO AS agent_no, c.CAUTION_MONEY AS caution_money, c.CREATE_TIME AS create_time, c.CUSTOMER_NO AS customer_no, c.CUSTOMER_TYPE AS customer_type, c.FULL_NAME AS full_name, c.LINK_NAME AS link_name, c.PHONE_NO AS phone_no, c.SHORT_NAME AS short_name, c.STATUS AS status, c.PROVINCE AS province, c.CITY AS city, d.CUSTOMER_PAY_NO AS pay_no, h.MSG AS msg FROM CUSTOMER c left join device d on d.CUSTOMER_NO = c.customer_no left join (SELECT CUSTOMER_NO, MSG from ( SELECT id, CUSTOMER_NO, MSG FROM customer_history ORDER BY id DESC ) h GROUP BY CUSTOMER_NO ) h ON h.CUSTOMER_NO = c.customer_no WHERE 1 = 1 /~customer_no: and c.customer_no = '[customer_no]'~/ /~AGENT_NO: and c.agent_no = '[AGENT_NO]'~/ /~customer_type: and c.customer_type = '[customer_type]'~/ /~create_time_start: and c.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~create_time_end: and c.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~shortName: and c.SHORT_NAME like '%[shortName]%'~/ /~status: and c.STATUS = '[status]'~/ order by c.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT c.id AS id, c.optimistic AS optimistic, c.ACCOUNT_NAME AS account_name, c.ACCOUNT_NO AS account_no, c.BANK_CODE AS bank_code, c.CREATE_TIME AS create_time, c.CUSTOMER_NO AS customer_no, c.CUSTOMER_TYPE AS customer_type, c.OPEN_BANK_NAME AS open_bank_name FROM CUSTOMER_SETTLE c where 1=1 /~account_no: and c.account_no = '[account_no]'~/ /~account_name: and c.account_name like '%[account_name]%'~/ /~bank_code: and c.bank_code = '[bank_code]'~/ /~create_time_start: and c.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~create_time_end: and c.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~customer_no: and c.customer_no = '[customer_no]'~/ /~customer_type: and c.customer_type = '[customer_type]'~/ /~open_bank_name: and c.open_bank_name like '%[open_bank_name]%'~/ order by c.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT c.id AS id, c.optimistic AS optimistic, c.ACCOUNT_NAME AS account_name, c.ACCOUNT_NO AS account_no, c.BANK_CODE AS bank_code, c.CREATE_TIME AS create_time, c.CUSTOMER_NO AS customer_no, c.CUSTOMER_TYPE AS customer_type, c.OPEN_BANK_NAME AS open_bank_name, c.OPER AS oper FROM CUSTOMER_SETTLE_HISTORY c where 1=1 /~customer_no: and c.customer_no = '[customer_no]'~/ order by c.create_time desc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT c.id AS id, c.optimistic AS optimistic, c.ADDR AS addr, c.AGENT_NO AS agent_no, c.CAUTION_MONEY AS caution_money, c.CREATE_TIME AS create_time, c.CUSTOMER_NO AS customer_no, c.CUSTOMER_TYPE AS customer_type, c.FULL_NAME AS full_name, c.LINK_NAME AS link_name, c.PHONE_NO AS phone_no, c.SHORT_NAME AS short_name, c.STATUS AS status FROM CUSTOMER c WHERE c.status != 'TRUE' and c.status != 'FALSE' and c.status != 'AUDIT_REFUSE' and c.status != 'AGENT_REFUSE' /~status: and c.STATUS = '[status]'~/ /~customer_no: and c.customer_no = '[customer_no]'~/ /~shortName: and c.SHORT_NAME like '%[shortName]%'~/ /~agent_no: and c.AGENT_NO = '[agent_no]'~/ order by c.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT C.ID AS ID, C.OPTIMISTIC AS OPTIMISTIC, C.ADDR AS ADDR, C.AGENT_NO AS AGENT_NO, C.AGENT_TYPE AS AGENT_TYPE, C.CAUTION_MONEY AS CAUTION_MONEY, C.CREATE_TIME AS CREATE_TIME, C.FULL_NAME AS FULL_NAME, C.LINK_NAME AS LINK_NAME, C.PHONE_NO AS PHONE_NO, C.SHORT_NAME AS SHORT_NAME, C.STATUS AS STATUS, C.PAREN_ID AS PAREN_ID, C.AGENT_LEVEL AS AGENT_LEVEL, D.ACCOUNT_NAME AS ACCOUNT_NAME, D.ACCOUNT_NO AS ACCOUNT_NO, D.BANK_CODE AS BANK_CODE, D.AGENT_TYPE AS AGENT_TYPE, D.OPEN_BANK_NAME AS OPEN_BANK_NAME, E.BUSI_LICE_CERT AS BUSI_LICE_CERT, E.ID_CARD AS ID_CARD, E.OPEN_BANK_ACC_CERT AS OPEN_BANK_ACC_CERT, E.ORGANIZATION_CERT AS ORGANIZATION_CERT, E.TAX_REG_CERT AS TAX_REG_CERT FROM AGENT C LEFT JOIN AGENT_SETTLE D ON C.AGENT_NO = D.AGENT_NO LEFT JOIN agent_cert E ON C.AGENT_NO = E.AGENT_NO WHERE 1 = 1 /~agentNo: and c.AGENT_NO = '[agentNo]'~/ /~fullName: and c.FULL_NAME like '%[fullName]%'~/ /~allLevelAgentNo: and ((C.PAREN_ID IN (select AGENT_NO from agent a where a.PAREN_ID = '[allLevelAgentNo]') or C.PAREN_ID = '[allLevelAgentNo]') or C.AGENT_NO = '[allLevelAgentNo]')~/ /~twoLevelAgentNo: and C.PAREN_ID = '[twoLevelAgentNo]'~/ /~threeLevelAgentNo: and (C.PAREN_ID IN (select AGENT_NO from agent a where a.PAREN_ID = '[threeLevelAgentNo]'))~/ /~status: and C.STATUS = '[status]'~/ /~agentLevel: and c.AGENT_LEVEL = [agentLevel]~/ /~allTwoLevelAgentNo: and (C.PAREN_ID IN (select AGENT_NO from agent a where a.AGENT_NO = '[allTwoLevelAgentNo]' and a.PAREN_ID = '[agentParenId]'))~/ /~allThreeLevelAgentNo: AND ((PAREN_ID IN (SELECT AGENT_NO FROM agent a WHERE a.AGENT_NO = '[allThreeLevelAgentNo]' AND a.PAREN_ID = '[agentParenId]')) OR (c.PAREN_ID IN (SELECT AGENT_NO FROM agent t WHERE t.PAREN_ID = '[agentParenId]') AND C.AGENT_NO = '[allThreeLevelAgentNo]') OR (C.AGENT_NO = '[allThreeLevelAgentNo]' AND C.PAREN_ID = '[agentParenId]'))~/ /~parenId: and C.PAREN_ID = '[parenId]'~/ /~phoneNo: and C.PHONE_NO = '[phoneNo]'~/ /~agentType: and C.AGENT_TYPE = '[agentType]'~/ /~create_time_start: and C.CREATE_TIME >= str_to_date('[create_time_start]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~create_time_end: and C.CREATE_TIME <= str_to_date('[create_time_end]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ ORDER BY C.ID DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT F.ID, F.OPTIMISTIC, F.AGENT_NO, F.CREATE_TIME, F.FEE, F.FEE_TYPE, F.PRODUCT_TYPE, F.PROFIT_RATIO, F.PROFIT_TYPE, F.MAX_FEE, F.MIN_FEE, F.STATUS FROM AGENT_FEE F LEFT JOIN AGENT C ON C.AGENT_NO = F.AGENT_NO WHERE 1 = 1 /~agentNo: and c.agent_No = '[agentNo]'~/ /~fullName: and c.FULL_NAME like '%[fullName]%'~/ /~create_time_start: and F.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and F.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~PRODUCT_TYPE: and F.product_type = '[PRODUCT_TYPE]'~/ /~fee_start: and F.fee >= '[fee_start]' ~/ /~fee_end: and F.fee <= '[fee_end]' ~/ /~status: and F.status = '[status]'~/ ORDER BY F.ID DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT a.ID as id, a.OPTIMISTIC as optimistic, a.ACCOUNT_NAME as account_name, a.ACCOUNT_NO as account_no, a.AGENT_NO as agent_no, a.AGENT_TYPE as agent_type, a.BANK_CODE as bank_code, a.CREATE_TIME as create_time, a.OPEN_BANK_NAME as open_bank_name FROM AGENT_SETTLE a WHERE 1=1 /~create_time_start: and a.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~create_time_end: and a.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~agent_no: and a.agent_no = '[agent_no]'~/ /~account_name: and a.account_name like '%[account_name]%'~/ /~account_no: and a.account_no = '[account_no]'~/ /~agent_type: and a.agent_type = '[agent_type]'~/ /~bank_code: and a.bank_code = '[bank_code]'~/ /~open_bank_name: and a.open_bank_name like '%[open_bank_name]%'~/ ORDER BY a.ID DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT o.CODE as code, o.PARENT_CODE as parent_code, o.NAME as name, o.OPTIMISTIC as optimistic, o.IS_LEAF as is_leaf FROM ORGANIZATION o where 1=1 /~pid: and o.PARENT_CODE = '[pid]'~/ ORDER BY o.CODE ASC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT o.CODE as code, o.SHORT_NAME as short_name, o.FULL_NAME as full_name FROM BANK o where 1=1 /~bankNameStart: and o.SHORT_NAME like '[bankNameStart]%'~/ ORDER BY o.CODE ASC

property.name: sql
property.value: select chc.NAME as name, chc.DESCRIBE as describe FROM CUST_HELP_CENTRE chc where 1=1

property.name: sql
property.value: select b.ID as id, b.CONTENT as content, b.STATUS as status, b.CREATE_TIME as create_time, b.EFF_TIME as eff_time, b.EXT_TIME as ext_time, b.TITLE as title, b.SYS_CODE as sys_code, b.OPERATOR as operator from BULLETIN b where 1=1 /~title: and b.title like '%[title]%'~/ /~create_time_start: and b.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and b.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~sys_code: and sys_code = '[sys_code]'~/ /~status: and status = '[status]'~/ ORDER BY b.ID desc;

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT fee.id AS id, fee.optimistic AS optimistic, fee.CREATE_TIME AS create_time, fee.CUSTOMER_NO AS customer_no, c.SHORT_NAME AS short_name, FEE AS fee, FEE_TYPE AS fee_type, MAX_FEE AS max_fee, MIN_FEE AS min_fee, PRODUCT_TYPE AS product_type, fee.STATUS AS status FROM customer_fee fee INNER JOIN customer c ON fee.customer_no = c.customer_no where 1=1 /~customer_no: and fee.CUSTOMER_NO = '[customer_no]'~/ /~shortName: and c.SHORT_NAME like '%[shortName]%'~/ /~create_time_start: and fee.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and fee.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~PRODUCT_TYPE: and fee.product_type = '[PRODUCT_TYPE]'~/ /~fee_start: and fee.fee >= '[fee_start]' ~/ /~fee_end: and fee.fee <= '[fee_end]' ~/ /~status: and fee.status = '[status]'~/ order by fee.CUSTOMER_NO

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ke.id, ke.optimistic, ke.CREATE_TIME AS create_time, ke.CUSTOMER_NO AS customer_no, PUBLIC_KEY AS public_key, KEY_TYPE AS key_type, cus.SHORT_NAME AS short_name FROM customer_key ke INNER JOIN customer cus ON ke.customer_no = cus.customer_no where 1= 1 /~customer_no: and cus.customer_no = '[customer_no]'~/ /~shortName: and cus.SHORT_NAME like '%[shortName]%'~/ ORDER BY cus.customer_no

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT rb.id AS id, rb.optimistic AS optimistic, rb.INTERFACE_NAME AS interface_name, rb.INTERFACE_CODE AS interface_code, rb.RECON_BILL_URL AS recon_bill_url, rb.GENERATE_TIME AS generate_time, rb.CREATE_TIME AS create_time, rb.FILE_PREFIX AS file_prefix, rb.STATUS AS status FROM interface_recon_bill_config rb where 1= 1 /~interface_name: and rb.interface_name = '[interface_name]'~/ /~interface_code: and rb.interface_code = '[interface_code]'~/ /~recon_bill_url: and rb.recon_bill_url = '[recon_bill_url]'~/ /~generate_time: and rb.generate_time = '[generate_time]'~/ /~create_time_start: and rb.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and rb.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~status: and rb.status = '[status]'~/ ORDER BY rb.id desc;

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ado.OWNER_ID AS owner_id, ado.CREATE_TIME AS create_time, ado.FLOW_STATUS AS flow_status, ado.PURCHASE_CHANNEL AS purchase_channel, ado.PURCHASE_SERIAL_NUMBER AS purchase_serial_number, ado.PURCHASE_STATUS AS purchase_status, ado.QUANTITY AS quantity, ado.TOTAL AS total, ado.UNIT_PRICE AS unit_price, ado.UPDATE_TIME AS update_time, ado.USER AS user, dt.DEVICE_NAME AS device_name, ado.device_type_id AS device_type, a.AGENT_LEVEL AS level, a.SHORT_NAME AS agent_name, ado.OUT_ORDER_ID AS out_order_id, ado.ORDER_STATUS AS order_status FROM agent_device_order ado left join device_type dt on ado.device_type_id=dt.id left join agent a on ado.owner_id=a.agent_no left join customer c ON ado.owner_id=c.CUSTOMER_NO where 1= 1 /~purchase_serial_number: and ado.purchase_serial_number = '[purchase_serial_number]'~/ /~agent_no: and ado.owner_id = '[agent_no]'~/ /~level: and a.agent_level = '[level]'~/ /~user: and ado.user = '[user]'~/ /~purchase_channel: and ado.purchase_channel = '[purchase_channel]'~/ /~quantity_start: and ado.quantity >= [quantity_start] ~/ /~quantity_end: and ado.quantity <= [quantity_end] ~/ /~device_name: and dt.device_name = '[device_name]'~/ /~device_type_id: and dt.id = '[device_type_id]'~/ /~purchase_status: and ado.purchase_status = '[purchase_status]'~/ /~create_time_start: and ado.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and ado.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~update_time_start: and ado.update_time >= str_to_date('[update_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~update_time_end: and ado.update_time <= str_to_date('[update_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~purchase_status: and ado.purchase_status = '[purchase_status]'~/ /~flow_status: and ado.flow_status = '[flow_status]'~/ /~unit_price_start: and ado.unit_price >= [unit_price_start] ~/ /~unit_price_end: and ado.unit_price <= [unit_price_end] ~/ ORDER BY ado.create_time desc;

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT id AS id, ACTIVATE_TIME AS activate_time, AGENT_NO AS agent_no, BATCH_NUMBER AS batch_number, CHECK_CODE AS check_code, CREATE_TIME AS create_time, CUSTOMER_NO AS customer_no, CUSTOMER_PAY_NO AS customer_pay_no, OUT_WAREHOUSE_TIME AS out_warehouse_time, PURCHASE_SERIAL_NUMBER AS purchase_serial_number, QRCODE_URL AS qrcode_url, STATUS AS status, UPDATE_TIME AS update_time FROM device where 1= 1 /~create_time_start: and create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~update_time_start: and update_time >= str_to_date('[update_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~update_time_end: and update_time <= str_to_date('[update_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~batch_number: and batch_number = '[batch_number]'~/ /~purchase_serial_number: and purchase_serial_number = '[purchase_serial_number]'~/ ORDER BY create_time desc;

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT d.id AS id, d.ACTIVATE_TIME AS activate_time, d.AGENT_NO AS agent_no, d.BATCH_NUMBER AS batch_number, d.CHECK_CODE AS check_code, d.CREATE_TIME AS create_time, d.CUSTOMER_NO AS customer_no, d.CUSTOMER_PAY_NO AS customer_pay_no, d.OUT_WAREHOUSE_TIME AS out_warehouse_time, d.PURCHASE_SERIAL_NUMBER AS purchase_serial_number, d.QRCODE_URL AS qrcode_url, d.STATUS AS status, d.UPDATE_TIME AS update_time, dt.DEVICE_NAME AS device_name, dt.UNIT_PRICE AS unit_price FROM device d,device_type dt where 1= 1 and d.DEVICE_TYPE_ID=dt.id /~agent_no: and d.agent_no = '[agent_no]'~/ /~customer_pay_no: and d.customer_pay_no = '[customer_pay_no]'~/ /~status: and d.status = '[status]'~/ /~batch_number: and d.batch_number = '[batch_number]'~/ /~customer_no: and d.customer_no = '[customer_no]'~/ /~device_id: and d.id = '[device_id]'~/ /~purchase_serial_number: and d.purchase_serial_number = '[purchase_serial_number]'~/ /~out_warehouse_time_start: and d.out_warehouse_time >= str_to_date('[out_warehouse_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~out_warehouse_time_end: and d.out_warehouse_time <= str_to_date('[out_warehouse_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~activate_time_start: and d.activate_time >= str_to_date('[activate_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~activate_time_end: and d.activate_time <= str_to_date('[activate_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~create_time_start: and d.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and d.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~update_time_start: and d.update_time >= str_to_date('[update_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~update_time_end: and d.update_time <= str_to_date('[update_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~activate_time_start: and d.activate_time >= str_to_date('[activate_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~activate_time_end: and d.activate_time <= str_to_date('[activate_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ ORDER BY d.out_warehouse_time desc,d.id DESC ;

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT dp.BATCH_NUMBER AS batch_number, dp.CREATE_TIME AS create_time, dp.PURCHASE_STATUS AS purchase_status, dp.QUANTITY AS quantity, dp.TOTAL AS total, dp.UNIT_PRICE AS unit_price, dp.UPDATE_TIME AS update_time, dp.USER AS user, dt.DEVICE_NAME AS device_name FROM device_purch dp LEFT JOIN device_type dt on dp.DEVICE_TYPE_ID=dt.id where 1= 1 /~batch_number: and dp.batch_number = '[batch_number]'~/ /~device_name: and dt.device_name = '[device_name]'~/ /~device_type_id: and dt.id = '[device_type_id]'~/ /~user: and dp.user = '[user]'~/ /~purchase_status: and dp.purchase_status = '[purchase_status]'~/ /~unit_price_start: and dp.unit_price >= [unit_price_start] ~/ /~unit_price_end: and dp.unit_price <= [unit_price_end] ~/ /~quantity_start: and dp.quantity >= [quantity_start] ~/ /~quantity_end: and dp.quantity <= [quantity_end] ~/ /~create_time_start: and dp.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and dp.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~update_time_start: and dp.update_time >= str_to_date('[update_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~update_time_end: and dp.update_time <= str_to_date('[update_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~purchase_status: and dp.purchase_status = '[purchase_status]'~/ ORDER BY dp.create_time desc;

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT dt.id AS id, c.DEVICE_NAME as parent_name, dt.DEVICE_NAME AS device_name, dt.REMARK AS remark, dt.UNIT_PRICE AS unit_price, dt.status AS status FROM device_type dt left JOIN device_type c on dt.parent_id=c.id where 1= 1 /~device_name: and dt.device_name = '[device_name]'~/ /~parent_name: and c.device_name = '[parent_name]'~/

property.name: sql
property.value: select b.id as id, b.MSG_TXT as msg_txt, b.STATUS as status, b.CREATE_TIME as create_time, b.TITLE as title, b.TYPE as type, b.SORT as sort, b.UPDATE_TIME as update_time, b.OPER as oper from protocol_management b where 1=1 /~title: and b.title like '%[title]%'~/ /~create_time_start: and b.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and b.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~update_time_start: and b.update_time >= str_to_date('[update_time_start]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~update_time_end: and b.update_time <= str_to_date('[update_time_end]','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~type: and type = '[type]'~/ /~sort: and sort = '[sort]'~/ /~status: and status = '[status]'~/ ORDER BY b.id desc;

property.name: sql
property.value: select b.id as id, b.MSG_TXT as msg_txt, b.STATUS as status, b.CREATE_TIME as create_time, b.TITLE as title, b.TYPE as type, b.SORT as sort, b.UPDATE_TIME as update_time, b.OPER as oper from protocol_management b where 1=1 and status = 'TRUE' /~sort: and b.sort = '[sort]'~/ /~title: and (b.title like '%[title]%'~/ /~title: or b.content like '%[title]%')~/ ORDER BY b.id desc;

property.name: sql
property.value: select d.id as id, d.operator as operator, d.update_time as update_time, d.update_key as update_key from device_config_history d order by d.update_time desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select d.id as id, d.operator as operator, d.update_time as update_time, d.update_key as update_key from device_config_history d order by d.update_time desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select a.id as id, a.adType as ad_type, a.name as name, a.imageUrl as image_url, a.imageClickUrl as image_click_url, a.status as status, a.createTime as create_time, a.updateTime as update_time, a.oem as oem, ag.agent_no as agent_no from ad a LEFT JOIN agent ag on a.OEM=ag.short_name WHERE 1=1 /~id: and a.id = '[id]'~/ /~name: and a.name = '[name]'~/ /~ad_type: and a.adType = '[ad_type]'~/ /~status: and a.status = '[status]'~/ /~boss: and (ag.agent_no = '' or ag.agent_no is null)~/ /~oem: and a.oem = '[oem]'~/ /~agent_no: and ag.agent_no = '[agent_no]'~/ /~create_time_start: and a.createTime >= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~create_time_end: and a.createTime <= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~update_time_start: and a.updateTime >= str_to_date('[update_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~update_time_end: and a.updateTime <= str_to_date('[update_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ ORDER BY a.createTime DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: select a.id as id, a.adType as ad_type, a.name as name, a.imageUrl as image_url, a.imageClickUrl as image_click_url, a.status as status, a.createTime as create_time, a.updateTime as update_time from Ad a WHERE 1=1 and status='TRUE' /~id: and a.id = '[id]'~/ /~name: and a.name = '[name]'~/ /~ad_type: and a.adType = '[ad_type]'~/ /~status: and a.status = '[status]'~/ /~create_time_start: and a.createTime >= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~create_time_end: and a.createTime <= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~update_time_start: and a.updateTime >= str_to_date('[update_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~update_time_end: and a.updateTime <= str_to_date('[update_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ ORDER BY a.createTime DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: select u.id as id, c.CUSTOMER_NO as customer_no, c.PHONE_NO as phone_no, u.CONTENT as content, u.CREATE_TIME as create_time, a.AGENT_NO as agent_no, u.OEM as oem from User_FeedBack u,customer c,agent a WHERE 1=1 and u.CUSTOMER_NO = c.customer_no and u.OEM = a.short_name /~agent_no: and a.AGENT_NO = '[agent_no]'~/ /~customer_no: and u.CUSTOMER_NO= '[customer_no]'~/ /~phone: and c.phone_no= '[phone]'~/ /~create_time_start: and u.create_time>= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~create_time_end: and u.create_time<= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ ORDER BY u.create_time desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select a.id as id, a.AGENT_NO as agent_no, a.REMARK as remark, a.SHORT_APP as short_app, a.CREATE_TIME as createTime, a.TYPE as type, a.VERSION as version, a.URL as url, a.APP_AUDIT_STATUS as app_audit_status from app_version a WHERE 1=1 /~agent_no: and a.agent_no= '[agent_no]'~/ /~short_app: and a.short_app like '%[short_app]%' ~/ /~app_audit_status: and a.app_audit_status = '[app_audit_status]'~/ ORDER BY a.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select m.id as id, m.NAME as name, m.DESCRIPTION as description, m.CATEGORY as category, m.RATE as rate, m.MCC as mcc from mcc_info m where 1 = 1 /~mcc: and m.mcc = '[mcc]'~/ /~category: and m.category = '[category]'~/ /~name: and m.name = '[name]'~/ ORDER BY m.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select s.id as id, s.KEY_VAL as key_val, s.KEY_NAME as key_name, s.CHECK_VALUE as check_value from secret_key s where 1 = 1 /~key_val: and s.key_val = '[key_val]'~/ /~key_name: and s.key_name = '[key_name]'~/ ORDER BY s.id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select s.id as id, s.SHOP_NO as shop_no, s.SHOP_NAME as shop_name, s.PRINT_NAME as print_name, s.BIND_PHONE_NO as bind_phone_no, s.STATUS as status, s.CREATE_TIME as create_time, s.CUSTOMER_NO as customer_no from shop s,customer c where 1 = 1 and s.customer_no = c.CUSTOMER_NO /~shop_no: and s.shop_no = '[shop_no]'~/ /~shop_name: and s.shop_name = '[shop_name]'~/ /~print_name: and s.print_name = '[print_name]'~/ /~bind_phone_no: and s.bind_phone_no = '[bind_phone_no]'~/ /~status: and s.status = '[status]'~/ /~customer_no: and c.customer_no = '[customer_no]'~/ /~create_time_start: and s.create_time>= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~create_time_end: and s.create_time<= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ ORDER BY s.create_time desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select p.id as id, p.BATCH_NO as batch_no, p.CREATE_TIME as create_time, p.LAST_SIGNIN_TIME as last_signin_time, p.M_KEY as m_key, p.OPERATOR as operator, p.PARAM_VERSION as param_version, p.POS_BRAND as pos_brand, p.POS_CATI as pos_cati, p.POS_SN as pos_sn, p.pos_Type as pos_type, p.RUN_STATUS as run_status, p.SOFT_VERSION as soft_version, p.STATUS as status, p.TYPE as type, p.customer_id as customer_id, p.shop_id as shop_id, p.CUSTOMER_NO as customer_no, p.SHOP_NO as shop_no, p.ROUTE_TYPE AS trans_type, p.AGENT_NO as agent_no from pos p where 1 = 1 /~pos_cati: and p.pos_cati = '[pos_cati]' ~/ /~type: and p.type = '[type]' ~/ /~status: and p.status = '[status]' ~/ /~run_status: and p.run_status = '[run_status]' ~/ /~batch_no: and p.batch_no = '[batch_no]' ~/ /~customer_no: and p.customer_no = '[customer_no]' ~/ /~agent_no: and p.agent_no = '[agent_no]'~/ /~agent_no_left: and p.agent_no like '[agent_no_left]%'~/ /~pos_sn: and p.pos_sn = '[pos_sn]'~/ ORDER BY p.create_time desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select p.id as id, p.BATCH_NO as batch_no, p.CREATE_TIME as create_time, p.LAST_SIGNIN_TIME as last_signin_time, p.M_KEY as m_key, p.OPERATOR as operator, p.PARAM_VERSION as param_version, p.POS_BRAND as pos_brand, p.POS_CATI as pos_cati, p.POS_SN as pos_sn, p.pos_Type as pos_type, p.RUN_STATUS as run_status, p.SOFT_VERSION as soft_version, p.STATUS as status, p.TYPE as type, p.customer_id as customer_id, p.shop_id as shop_id, p.CUSTOMER_NO as customer_no, p.SHOP_NO as shop_no, p.ROUTE_TYPE AS trans_type, p.AGENT_NO as agent_no from pos p where 1 = 1 and p.CUSTOMER_NO IS NULL AND p.AGENT_NO IS NULL /~pos_cati: and p.pos_cati = '[pos_cati]' ~/ /~type: and p.type = '[type]' ~/ /~status: and p.status = '[status]' ~/ /~run_status: and p.run_status = '[run_status]' ~/ /~batch_no: and p.batch_no = '[batch_no]' ~/ /~pos_sn: and p.pos_sn = '[pos_sn]'~/ ORDER BY p.create_time desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select p.id as id, p.BATCH_NO as batch_no, p.CREATE_TIME as create_time, p.LAST_SIGNIN_TIME as last_signin_time, p.M_KEY as m_key, p.OPERATOR as operator, p.PARAM_VERSION as param_version, p.POS_BRAND as pos_brand, p.POS_CATI as pos_cati, p.POS_SN as pos_sn, p.pos_Type as pos_type, p.RUN_STATUS as run_status, p.SOFT_VERSION as soft_version, p.STATUS as status, p.TYPE as type, p.customer_id as customer_id, p.shop_id as shop_id, p.CUSTOMER_NO as customer_no, p.SHOP_NO as shop_no, p.ROUTE_TYPE AS trans_type, p.AGENT_NO as agent_no from pos p where 1 = 1 and p.CUSTOMER_NO IS NULL /~pos_cati: and p.pos_cati = '[pos_cati]' ~/ /~type: and p.type = '[type]' ~/ /~status: and p.status = '[status]' ~/ /~run_status: and p.run_status = '[run_status]' ~/ /~batch_no: and p.batch_no = '[batch_no]' ~/ /~agent_no: and p.agent_no = '[agent_no]'~/ /~pos_sn: and p.pos_sn = '[pos_sn]'~/ ORDER BY p.create_time desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select id as id, APP_ID as app_id, ATTRE as attre, CREATE_TIME as create_time, CUSTOMER_NO as customer_no, INDUSTRY as industry, INTERFACE_NO as interface_no, INTERFACE_TYPE as interface_type, STATUS as status, REMARK as remark from report_customer where 1 = 1 /~id: and id = '[id]' ~/ /~app_id: and app_id = '[app_id]' ~/ /~attre: and attre = '[attre]' ~/ /~customer_no: and customer_no = '[customer_no]' ~/ /~industry: and industry = '[industry]' ~/ /~interface_no: and interface_no = '[interface_no]' ~/ /~interface_type: and interface_type = '[interface_type]' ~/ /~remark: and remark = '[remark]' ~/ /~create_time_start: and create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ ORDER BY id desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select t.CODE as code, t.SETTLE_CODE as settle_code, t.CUSTOMER_NO as customer_no, t.ACCOUNT_NAME as account_name, t.ACCOUNT_NO as account_no, t.CARD_TYPE as card_type, t.BANK_NAME as bank_name, t.ID_NUMBER as id_number, t.PHONE as phone, t.CARD_STATUS as card_status, t.CARD_ATTR as card_attr, t.TIED_TIME as tied_time, t.UNLOCK_TIME as unlock_time from trans_card t where 1 = 1 /~code: and t.code = '[code]' ~/ /~settle_code: and t.settle_code = '[settle_code]' ~/ /~customer_no: and t.customer_no = '[customer_no]' ~/ /~account_name: and t.account_name = '[account_name]' ~/ /~account_no: and t.account_no = '[account_no]' ~/ /~card_type: and t.card_type = '[card_type]' ~/ /~id_number: and t.id_number = '[id_number]' ~/ /~phone: and t.phone = '[phone]' ~/ /~card_status: and t.card_status = '[card_status]' ~/ /~card_attr: and t.card_attr = '[card_attr]' ~/ /~tied_time_start: and t.tied_time >= str_to_date('[tied_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~tied_time_end: and t.tied_time <= str_to_date('[tied_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~unlock_time_start: and t.unlock_time >= str_to_date('[unlock_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~unlock_time_end: and t.unlock_time <= str_to_date('[unlock_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ ORDER BY t.tied_time desc

property.name: sql
property.value: select p.CUSTOMER_NO as customer_no, p.POS_TYPE as pos_type, p.PHONE as phone, p.ADDR as addr, p.REMARK as remark, p.REQUEST_RECORD as request_record, p.CREATE_TIME as create_time from pos_purchase p where 1 = 1 /~customer_no: and p.customer_no = '[customer_no]'~/ /~pos_type: and p.pos_type = '[pos_type]'~/ /~phone: and p.phone = '[phone]'~/ /~addr: and p.addr = '[addr]'~/ /~request_record: and p.request_record = '[request_record]'~/ /~time_start: and p.create_time >= str_to_date('[time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~time_end: and p.create_time <= str_to_date('[time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ ORDER BY p.create_time desc
